translations: n.[雷达] 雷达天线罩；整流罩

phrs.translation: 天线罩, 整流罩, 雷达天线罩
天线罩颜色, 外壳颜色, 天线颜色, 外罩颜色
天线罩材料, 外罩材料, 天线外罩材料, 外壳材料
光学天线罩, 光辐射

sentences.sentence: The radome was hinged to permit easier access to the radar.
sentences.translation: 雷达天线罩以铰链方式安装以便于检修雷达。

sentences.sentence: SATCOM antenna radome is mounted on the roof of the workshop.
sentences.translation: 一部SATCOM天线罩安装在车厢顶上。

sentences.sentence: In this paper the repair of damaged honeycomb sandwich radome was studied.
sentences.translation: 本文研究了蜂窝夹层结构雷达天线罩损伤的修补。
